com.revature.controllers

Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revature.controllers.LoginController

  • @Controller
 @RestController
 @CrossOrigin
public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is our controller for logging in and handling sessions.
    Author:
    Jonathan

      RUser getSession(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
